# PEARLMAN Designs
> Luxury interior design and project management studio in the Swiss Alps

## About
PEARLMAN Designs is a luxury interior design and project management studio based in Lens, Switzerland, a stone's throw from Crans-Montana. Founded by designer Adriana Pearlman and managing director Julien Falque, the studio specializes in high-end alpine residential properties throughout the Swiss Alps.

## Services
- Bespoke Interior Design
- Interior Architecture
- Project Management
- FF&E Procurement (Furniture, Fixtures & Equipment)
- Turnkey Solutions from conception to completion

## Location & Contact
Route de Crans 97, 1978 Lens, Valais, Switzerland
Phone: +41 79 355 82 41
Email: info@pearlmandesigns.com

## Areas Served
Crans-Montana, Gstaad, Verbier, Nendaz, Anz√®re, and surrounding Swiss Alpine villages
